name: WKInterfaceGroup
desc: A container for one or more interface objects.

items.name: func setBackgroundColor(UIColor?)
items.desc: Changes the background color for the group container.

items.name: func setBackgroundImage(UIImage?)
items.desc: Changes the background image of the group container to the specified image.

items.name: func setBackgroundImageData(Data?)
items.desc: Changes the background image of the group container to the image in the specified data object.

items.name: func setBackgroundImageNamed(String?)
items.desc: Changes the background image of the group container to the image in the specified resource file.

items.name: func setCornerRadius(CGFloat)
items.desc: Changes the radius to use when drawing rounded corners for the group.

items.name: func setContentInset(UIEdgeInsets)
items.desc: Sets the distance between the edges of the group and any contained objects.
